skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the Tholz Smart Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact by voice with Tholz's smart devices: product lines for Pool, Home Heating, Spa (Spazzio) and Home Lighting (Smartz).

To get started, download the Tholz Smart Home app from your app store, create your Tholz account and add your products. Then, search for the Tholz Smart Home skill in the skills tab of the Amazon Alexa app. Then tap the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Tholz account and discover your devices.

To use the skill, you must know the name of your devices, which are displayed in the Tholz Smart Home application. You can also create an Alexa group and add the devices to the group. After you know your device name or group name, try the commands below.

Heating:
“Alexa, what is the pool heating temperature?”
“Alexa, set pool heating to 82°”
“Alexa, increase the temperature of the spa heating”
“Alexa, decrease the temperature of the boiler heating”
“Alexa, turn on spa heating”
“Alexa, turn off spa heating”
“Alexa, set boiler heating to automatic”

Tholz Heat Pump:
“Alexa, turn on heat pump”
“Alexa, turn off heat pump”
“Alexa, set heat pump to auto mode”
“Alexa, set heat pump to heat mode”
“Alexa, set heat pump to cool mode“
“Alexa, turn on heat pump silent mode”
“Alexa, turn off heat pump silent mode”

Light:
“Alexa, turn on pool light”
“Alexa, turn off bedroom light”
“Alexa, set pool light to blue”
“Alexa, set spa light to 75%”
“Alexa, increase the brightness of pool light”
“Alexa, decrease the brightness of pool light”
“Alexa, set hot tub light to effect 2”
“Alexa, increase the speed of pool light”
“Alexa, decrease the speed of pool light”
“Alexa, set LED strip light to full speed”

Filter / Auxiliary Outputs:
“Alexa, turn on pool filter”
“Alexa, turn off pool filter”
“Alexa, turn on pool waterfall”
“Alexa, turn off spa whirlpool”

Switches:
“Alexa, turn on living room chandelier”
“Alexa, turn off dining room”
“Alexa, turn on kiosk”
“Alexa, turn off kitchen main light”
